title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 4: Max Strength — Intensification
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Lower reps, higher intensity, emphasize knee‑dominant eccentrics & bracing.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Safety Bar Squat 5x3, Bulgarian Split Squat 4x5/leg (2s pause)

notes: Week 1: 4x4; Week 2: 5x3 @RPE8. Keep one Z2 and one technique session.
